imdi:VocabularyDef.Name: Content-Interactivity
imdi:VocabularyDef.imdi:Description: A list of values for the Interactivity aspect of Content
imdi:VocabularyDef.imdi:Entry: Definition: Speech events consists of verbal interaction between at least two participants. Comments: The event may or may not include an investigator.
Definition: Speech/song produced without expecting extended verbal responses from hearer(s). Comments: Corresponds often to monologue.
Definition: Primarily monologic speech punctuated by repeated interjections from the hearer(s).
